text: Manitarkalai accamutti eccarippatarkakavum, iman kontavarkalukku avarkalutaiya iraivanitam niccayamakap perum patavi kitaikkum enru nanmarayam kuruvatarkakavum, avarkalilirunte nam oru manitarukku vahi arulkirom enpatil makkalukku accariyam erpattu vittata? Kahpirkalo, "niccayamaka ivar pakirankamana cuniyakkarare" enru kurukinranar
